title: league of legends client bugsplat loop

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: when i open my league of legends it loops bugsplat when i close discord and reopen it doesn't happen any way i can run discord and league at the same time?

replies.body:
Hey summoner,

There appears to be an issue with bugsplat loops at the moment. To run discord and League at the same time you will need to disable the discord overlay as a temp fix. We'll let you know when we know more about it.
